statements: SELECT * FROM leaderboard
SELECT student_id, game_id, score FROM leaderboard
SELECT * FROM leaderboard WHERE game_id = 1
SELECT * FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100
SELECT student_id, score FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT * FROM leaderboard
SELECT student_id, score, game_id FROM leaderboard
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100
SELECT student_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM leaderboard GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY highest_score DESC
SELECT game_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM leaderboard GROUP BY game_id HAVING AVG(score) > 80
SELECT student_name, total_points FROM students;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE total_points > 100;
SELECT student_name, total_points FROM students ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT student_name, total_points FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, score FROM leaderboard ORDER BY position ASC;
SELECT student_name, total_points FROM students ORDER BY total_points DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY position ASC
SELECT student_name, score FROM students JOIN leaderboard ON students.student_id = leaderboard.student_id
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 3
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students, AVG(total_points) AS average_points FROM students
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT game_name, game_id, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT student_name, game_name, score FROM students INNER JOIN leaderboard ON students.student_id = leaderboard.student_id WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM games WHERE game_name LIKE 'M%';
SELECT student_name, game_name, score FROM students s INNER JOIN leaderboard l ON s.student_id = l.student_id INNER JOIN games g ON l.game_id = g.game_id ORDER BY score DESC, student_name ASC

SELECT student_name, game_name, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM students s INNER JOIN leaderboard l ON s.student_id = l.student_id INNER JOIN games g ON l.game_id = g.game_id GROUP BY student_name, game_name
SELECT student_name, COUNT(game_id) AS num_games_played FROM students s LEFT JOIN leaderboard l ON s.student_id = l.student_id GROUP BY student_name ORDER BY num_games_played DESC

SELECT student_id, student_name, game_name, score FROM students s LEFT JOIN leaderboard l ON s.student_id = l.student_id LEFT JOIN games g ON l.game_id = g.game_id WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT AVG(score) AS average_score, game_name FROM leaderboard l INNER JOIN games g ON l.game_id = g.game_id GROUP BY game_name ORDER BY average_score DESC
SELECT * FROM leaderboard;
SELECT student_name, score FROM students, leaderboard WHERE students.student_id = leaderboard.student_id;
SELECT class_name, COUNT(*) as total_students FROM students INNER JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id GROUP BY class_name;
SELECT game_name, AVG(score) as avg_score FROM leaderboard INNER JOIN games ON leaderboard.game_id = games.game_id GROUP BY game_name;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT student_name, game_name, score FROM students JOIN leaderboard ON students.student_id = leaderboard.student_id JOIN games ON leaderboard.game_id = games.game_id;
SELECT student_id, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM leaderboard GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY total_score DESC;

SELECT student_name, game_name, score FROM students JOIN leaderboard ON students.student_id = leaderboard.student_id JOIN games ON leaderboard.game_id = games.game_id WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score ASC;

SELECT class_name, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM leaderboard JOIN students ON leaderboard.student_id = students.student_id JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id GROUP BY class_name ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM leaderboard;
SELECT student_id, score FROM leaderboard WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM games WHERE game_category = 'Puzzle';
SELECT student_name, class_name FROM students JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id;
SELECT teacher_name, class_name FROM teacher JOIN classes ON teacher.class_id = classes.class_id;
SELECT * FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT game_name, game_category FROM games WHERE game_id = 1;

SELECT student_name, class_name, game_name, score FROM students s JOIN leaderboard l ON s.student_id = l.student_id JOIN games g ON l.game_id = g.game_id JOIN classes c ON s.class_id = c.class_id WHERE l.score > 50 ORDER BY student_name ASC, score DESC;

SELECT t.teacher_name, c.class_name, COUNT(s.student_id) AS student_count FROM teacher t JOIN classes c ON t.class_id = c.class_id JOIN students s ON c.class_id = s.class_id GROUP BY t.teacher_name, c.class_name;
SELECT s.student_name, SUM(l.score) AS total_score FROM students s JOIN leaderboard l ON s.student_id = l.student_id GROUP BY s.student_name HAVING total_score > 200;
